question: MLB: Washington Nationals vs. Chicago Cubs 2023-05-01
description:
In the upcoming MLB game, scheduled for May 1 at 12:00 AM ET:

If the Washington Nationals win, the market will resolve to “Nationals”.

If the Chicago Cubs win, the market will resolve to “Cubs”.

 If the game is not completed by May 15, 2023 (11:59:59 PM ET), the market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will the new "mystery balloon" be downed by May 2?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the new "mystery balloon" reported floating over US territory (https://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-military-tracking-another-mysterious-balloon-rcna82300) is destroyed, downed, or otherwise grounded by any means by May 2, 2023, 11:59:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The balloon's destruction, downing, or grounding will trigger a "Yes" resolution regardless of whether it occurs naturally or artificially. If the balloon lands in or is otherwise downed into any body of water or onto any land mass, it will trigger a "Yes" resolution.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official statements made by the government of the United States of America, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Will Binance list $PEPE by Friday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Binance.com lists $PEPE (https://etherscan.io/token/0x6982508145454Ce325dDbE47a25d4ec3d2311933) by May 5, 2023, 11:59:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

Binance.com listing $PEPE refers to Binance.com opening spot trading for a pair with $PEPE by the resolution time.

question: ETH above $1,850 on May 3?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Binance 1 minute candle for ETH/USDT titled 2023/05/03 12:00 in the ET timezone (referring to noon ET) has a final “Close” price of 1,850.01 or higher, or to "No" otherwise.

The resolution source for this market is https://www.binance.com, specifically the ETH/USDT “Close” prices, currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT. The Binance API url for ETH/USDT may be used in the event that the chart is unavailable.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETH/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

events.title: ETH above $1,850 on May 3?
events.description: This is a market group for the price market for ETH
